description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- [stable-3.16] make version.cmake more readable by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7986
- [stable-3.16] remove gcc and clang build checks by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8025
- [stable-3.16] gui/macOS: Avoid UB in edge cases where there is no matching accountstate for a domain by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8028
- [stable-3.16] gui: fix dark mode change on Windows 10 with universal style by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8037
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/input pin title too wide by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8042
- [stable-3.16] explicitly set colours for header items by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8049
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/highlight too bright appimage by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8051
Full Changelog: nextcloud/desktop@v3.16.1...v3.16.2
